sense.def:
To sympathize with someone
pomeni nekomu pokazati, da se nam smili, ker se mu je zgodilo nekaj neprijetnega ali hudega.

seg.quote: I sympathized with her and tried to help.

sense.def:
To sympathize with someone's feelings
pomeni razumeti občutke drugega in ga ne kritizirati zaradi njih.

seg.quote: I can sympathize with your hesitations.

sense.def:
To sympathize with a proposal or action
pomeni odobravati predlog ali dejanje in ga biti pripravljen podpreti.

seg.quote: Everyone sympathised with the anti-colonial cause.
